about.details:
Incorporated in 2013, Kids Medical Systems Ltd is engaged in providing solution in healthcare sector as pediatric clinic chain provider. Kids Clinic (TKC) is a venture of "Kids Medical Systems Private Ltd".

They partner with doctors at a clinic /premise level. They offer services which help doctors to manage, educate and develop their clinic, its infrastructure, its people and provide guidance in services to parents of the child. They also provide services like timely reminders on vaccinations.

They provide the service Management/Light Asset Model which includes the clinic Management Software, clinic reports, Training, recruitment of staff, Online and Offline engagement with customers. In addition they also provide Glow sign Boards, Paraphernalia, Standees and also arrange for co-branding marketing efforts, as and when required in Pre-School, Schools, mailers, SMS, whatsApp or other electronic or through other devices or modes. They are also engaged in providing hospital consultancy to their Doctor Partners.

contactDetails.full_address: Kids Medical Systems Limited, F-806 Titanium City Center, Nr. Sachin Towers 100 Feet Ring Road, Anand Nagar Road Satellite

faqs.question: What is the Kids Medical Systems IPO?
faqs.answer:
Kids Medical Systems IPO is a SME IPO of 2000000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹6.00 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹30 per share. The minimum order quantity is 4000.

The IPO opens on December 11, 2017, and closes on December 14, 2017.

Purva Sharegistry India Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Kids Medical Systems IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Kids Medical Systems IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Kids Medical Systems IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Kids Medical Systems IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Kids Medical Systems IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Kids Medical Systems IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Kids Medical Systems IPO opens on December 11, 2017 and closes on December 14, 2017.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Kids Medical Systems IPO?
faqs.answer: Kids Medical Systems IPO lot size is 4000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,20,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Kids Medical Systems IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Kids Medical Systems IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
